resources.string: Cappuccinos, espressos & juices, plus breakfast, salads & sandwiches, in a tranquil little cafe.
Start Your Day Right: Explore Some Breakfast Spots
Low-key park cafe set in a former gardener\'s cottage with a terrace, offering European dishes
